title: League Keeps Crashing
body:
So...
The thing is League keeps crashing my computer or league itself, as soon as I join a game. The team had decided to remake the game. Afterwards I uninstalled league, reinstalled it. Then, I tested it out on a custom game it worked fine but as soon as I join a pvp match meaning in-game it crashes. Today, it happened again and did a custom afterwards it worked fine. I don't know whats going on can someone please tell me what's going on? It was working fine 3 days ago....

replies.body: Do you get a specific error message or see any specific behavior when this crash happens? With a bit more information, I'll be able to determine what could be causing this.
Thank you, I will try this out soon!
